65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: وعن عقبة بن صهبان، قال سمعت عبد الله بن المغفل المزني، في البول في المغتسل

chapter.eng-name: The Statement of Allah the Most High: "...When they gave their Bai'a (pledge) to you (O Muḥammad ﷺ) under the tree..." (V.48:18)
